name: Development Cycle Meta-Router V1

stages.name: Request Classification
stages.description: Classify user request as bug fix, feature request, refactor, or question

decisions.description: Request is a simple code modification

stages.name: Bug Fix Pipeline
stages.description: Execute bug-fix-v1 pipeline for bug fixes

stages.name: Quick Code Change
stages.description: Handle simple, direct code modifications (1-5 lines)

stages.name: Feature Development Pipeline
stages.description: Execute feature-development-v1 pipeline for new features

stages.name: Handle Question
stages.description: Answer user questions about code or system

connections.description: Bug detected, route to bug-fix pipeline
Simple change requested, use direct code implementer
Feature requested, route to feature-development pipeline
Bug fix pipeline complete - PIPELINE ENDS
Feature development pipeline complete - PIPELINE ENDS

userContext: BUG FIX: When the user double-clicks an item in their inventory via the ship fitting UI at a station, they get this error: 'Uncaught TypeError: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading hull)' at StationUI.js:1605 in the autoFitItem function, called from line 1450. The error indicates that when autoFitItem is called from the double-click handler, the ship object is undefined when trying to access ship.hull. This is a critical bug preventing players from fitting items to their ships. Find the root cause of why the ship object is undefined in this context, fix it so double-clicking items properly fits them to the ship, and create a test that verifies the fix works.
